    <article class="markdown-body entry-content" itemprop="mainContentOfPage"><table data-table-type="yaml-metadata">

<h2><a id="user-content-data-cleaning" class="anchor" href="#data-cleaning" aria-hidden="true"><span class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Data Cleaning</h2>

<p>To clean the data, the first row index and all colomuns with NA were removed. The traing and testing data were saved as traing2.csv and testing2.csv. </p>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-r"><pre><span class="pl-c"># Remove everything in current working library</span>
rm(<span class="pl-v">list</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> ls())
<span class="pl-c"># Read cleaned training and testing data </span>
<span class="pl-smi">training</span> <span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span> read.table(<span class="pl-v">file</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>pml-training2.csv<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>, 
                       <span class="pl-v">header</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-c1">TRUE</span>, <span class="pl-v">sep</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>,<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>, <span class="pl-v">quote</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>)
<span class="pl-smi">testing</span> <span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span> read.table(<span class="pl-v">file</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>pml-testing2.csv<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>, 
                      <span class="pl-v">header</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-c1">TRUE</span>, <span class="pl-v">sep</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>,<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>, <span class="pl-v">quote</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>)
<span class="pl-c"># Change the numeric type to integer type to make sure </span>
<span class="pl-c"># the same data type in training data and testing data</span>
<span class="pl-smi">training</span><span class="pl-k">$</span><span class="pl-smi">magnet_dumbbell_z</span> <span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span> as.integer(<span class="pl-smi">training</span><span class="pl-k">$</span><span class="pl-smi">magnet_dumbbell_z</span>)
<span class="pl-smi">training</span><span class="pl-k">$</span><span class="pl-smi">magnet_forearm_y</span> <span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span> as.integer(<span class="pl-smi">training</span><span class="pl-k">$</span><span class="pl-smi">magnet_forearm_y</span>)
<span class="pl-smi">training</span><span class="pl-k">$</span><span class="pl-smi">magnet_forearm_z</span> <span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span> as.integer(<span class="pl-smi">training</span><span class="pl-k">$</span><span class="pl-smi">magnet_forearm_z</span>)
<span class="pl-c"># Change the </span>
levels(<span class="pl-smi">testing</span><span class="pl-k">$</span><span class="pl-smi">new_window</span>) <span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span> levels(<span class="pl-smi">training</span><span class="pl-k">$</span><span class="pl-smi">new_window</span>)</pre></div>

<h2><a id="user-content-exploratory-data-analysis" class="anchor" href="#exploratory-data-analysis" aria-hidden="true"><span class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Exploratory Data Analysis</h2>

<p>Cross Validation was performed to find the out of sample errors. </p>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-r"><pre><span class="pl-c"># Install randomForest package</span>
<span class="pl-c"># install.packages("randomForest")</span>
library(<span class="pl-smi">randomForest</span>)
<span class="pl-c"># install.packages("caret")</span>
library(<span class="pl-smi">caret</span>)</pre></div>

<h2><a id="user-content-exploratory-data-analysis-1" class="anchor" href="#exploratory-data-analysis-1" aria-hidden="true"><span class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Exploratory Data Analysis</h2>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-r"><pre>set.seed(<span class="pl-c1">111</span>)
<span class="pl-c"># Define cross-validation experiment</span>
<span class="pl-v">fitControl</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> trainControl( <span class="pl-v">method</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>cv<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>, <span class="pl-v">number</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-c1">2</span>)
<span class="pl-c"># Perform the cross validation</span>
<span class="pl-smi">cv</span> <span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span> train(<span class="pl-smi">classe</span> <span class="pl-k">~</span> ., <span class="pl-v">data</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-smi">training</span>, <span class="pl-v">method</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>rf<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>, 
  <span class="pl-v">trControl</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-smi">fitControl</span>)
<span class="pl-smi">cv</span><span class="pl-k">$</span><span class="pl-smi">bestTune</span><span class="pl-k">$</span><span class="pl-smi">mtry</span></pre></div>

<h2><a id="user-content-exploratory-data-analysis-2" class="anchor" href="#exploratory-data-analysis-2" aria-hidden="true"><span class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Exploratory Data Analysis</h2>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-r"><pre><span class="pl-smi">cv</span></pre></div>

<h2><a id="user-content-build-random-forest-model-with-full-training-model" class="anchor" href="#build-random-forest-model-with-full-training-model" aria-hidden="true"><span class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Build random forest model with full training model</h2>

<p>Best Tune of number of variable randomly sampled is: <code>r cv$bestTune$mtry</code></p>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-r"><pre><span class="pl-v">RandomForest</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> randomForest(<span class="pl-smi">classe</span> <span class="pl-k">~</span> ., <span class="pl-v">data</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-smi">training</span>, 
                            <span class="pl-v">mtry</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-smi">cv</span><span class="pl-k">$</span><span class="pl-smi">bestTune</span><span class="pl-k">$</span><span class="pl-smi">mtry</span>)
<span class="pl-v">PredictForTrain</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> predict(<span class="pl-smi">RandomForest</span>)
table(<span class="pl-smi">PredictForTrain</span>, <span class="pl-smi">training</span><span class="pl-k">$</span><span class="pl-smi">classe</span>)</pre></div>

<h2><a id="user-content-predict-testing-data" class="anchor" href="#predict-testing-data" aria-hidden="true"><span class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Predict testing data</h2>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-r"><pre><span class="pl-v">PredictForest</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> predict(<span class="pl-smi">RandomForest</span>, <span class="pl-v">newdata</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-smi">testing</span>)
<span class="pl-smi">PredictForest</span></pre></div>

<h2><a id="user-content-write-the-prediction-to-files" class="anchor" href="#write-the-prediction-to-files" aria-hidden="true"><span class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Write the Prediction to files</h2>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-r"><pre><span class="pl-c"># Function to write a vector to files</span>
<span class="pl-v">pml_write_files</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-k">function</span>(<span class="pl-smi">x</span>){
  <span class="pl-v">n</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> length(<span class="pl-smi">x</span>)
  <span class="pl-k">for</span>(<span class="pl-smi">i</span> <span class="pl-k">in</span> <span class="pl-c1">1</span><span class="pl-k">:</span><span class="pl-smi">n</span>){
    <span class="pl-v">filename</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> paste0(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>problem_id_<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>, <span class="pl-smi">i</span> ,<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>.txt<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>)
    write.table(<span class="pl-smi">x</span>[<span class="pl-smi">i</span>], <span class="pl-v">file</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-smi">filename</span>, <span class="pl-v">quote</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-c1">FALSE</span>,
                <span class="pl-v">row.names</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-c1">FALSE</span>, <span class="pl-v">col.names</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-c1">FALSE</span>)
  }
}
<span class="pl-c"># Call the function</span>
pml_write_files(<span class="pl-smi">PredictForest</span>)
</pre></div>
</article>
